T16TD4393E:324a-0: @324a ` // slob dpon k'a ma la sh'i la'i smon lam mu gnyis ma bzhugs /
T16TD4393E:324a-2: * // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4393E:324a-3: bdag la brten nas sems bskyed pa'i //
T16TD4393E:324a-4: dri ma med pa'i sbyin pa la //
T16TD4393E:324a-5: brten nas yon bdag nyid grol te //
T16TD4393E:324a-6: de la yon bdag mi re zhing //
T16TD4393E:324a-7: 'jig rten re ba zhi bar shog / sgo gsum dri ma med pa yi //
T16TD4393E:324a-8: tshul khrims rgyan dang ldan par shog / sbyin pa 'di yi byin brlabs kyis //
T16TD4393E:324a-9: rtag tu longs spyod ldan par shog / longs spyod de la ma chags shing //
T16TD4393E:324a-10: sems can kun la snying rje bas //
T16TD4393E:324a-11: stong pa'i sems dang ldan par shog / sbyin pa 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
T16TD4393E:324b-0: dus 'dir bar du gcod @324b pa yi ;
T16TD4393E:324b-1: / bgegs rnams ma lus zhi gyur nas //
T16TD4393E:324b-2: rkyen rnams ma lus bzlog pa shog / bsrung bar gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis //
T16TD4393E:324b-3: g-yel ba med par bsrung bar shog / yid ches rten de 'phel bar shog /'di dang phyi ma gnyis kar yang //
T16TD4393E:324b-4: mi rnams kun gyis bkur bar shog / shin tu phra bar gyur ba yi //
T16TD4393E:324b-5: sbyin pa shin tu chung gyur kyang //
T16TD4393E:324b-6: sems kyis thongs pa'i sbyin pa 'di //
T16TD4393E:324b-7: dpag tu med pa 'phel gyur te //
T16TD4393E:324b-8: byang chub thob pa'i rten du shog / bla med byang chub thob gyur nas //
T16TD4393E:324b-11: / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4393E:324b-12: bdag kyang de la ma chags shing //
T16TD4393E:324b-13: khe dang rnyed pa bkur sti dang //
T16TD4393E:324b-14: 'jig rten snyan grags zhi bar shog / chags pa med pa rngam sems kyis //
T16TD4393E:324b-15: gzhan la re ba med par shog / phyogs 'dzin ngo bsrung med par shog / bdag gi dge ba mthar phyin nas //
T16TD4393E:324b-16: dri ma med pa'i dge ba yis //
T16TD4393E:324b-17: gzhan gyis bsod nams 'phel nus shog / dri ma med pas kun dag shog / brjod pa'i stobs kyis kun bral shog / bdag gzhan dge ba ma chad pa'i //
T16TD4393E:324b-18: bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
T16TD4393E:324b-19: byang chub 'bras bu thob nas kyang //
T16TD4393E:324b-20: ngan 'gro de la dgod pa dang //
T16TD4393E:324b-21: theg pa chung ngur sems bskyed nas //
T16TD4393E:324b-22: theg chen sa la 'god nus shog / slob dpon k'a ma la sh'i la'i smon lam mu gnyis ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
